transforms.name: vite:vue
vite:css
transforms.result: .dragged-enter{opacity:.3}.dragged-over{background:#73c4ff}.target{background-color:#7c7c7c}.fade-enter-active,.fade-leave-active{transition:opacity .2s ease}.fade-enter-from,.fade-leave-to{opacity:0}.select button{border-radius:30px!important;cursor:pointer;padding:11px 16px;width:150px!important}.select .group ul,.select .group ul li{border-radius:18px!important}.select .group ul li{align-items:center;cursor:pointer;display:flex;gap:10px;padding:10px;padding-right:40px!important;transition:.2s ease-in-out}.select .group ul li .i-heroicons-check-20-solid{color:#4caf50}.select .group ul li:hover,[data-headlessui-state="active selected"]{background-color:transparent!important;color:#f4c107}
